text: Gary Leonard Ackerman (born November 19, 1942) is a retired American politician. He was a member of the U.S. Representative from New York from 1983 to 2013. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ackerman at Biographical Directory of the United States Congress * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from Brooklyn Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gary Ackerman
